verses.roman:
caitanya-caritra ei--ikṣu-daṇḍa-sama
carvaṇa karite haya rasa-āsvādana

synonyms: caitanya-caritra—the characteristics of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ei—this; ikṣu-daṇḍa-sama—exactly like sugar cane; carvaṇa karite—chewing; haya—there is; rasa-āsvādana—a taste of juice.
translation: These characteristics of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu are like sugar cane that one can chew to relish transcendental juice.
